subject: Re: CALBEAF-53 - Coordination Plan Approved
body:

Perfect! Your coordination plan makes complete sense. Let's do this properly.

## ðŸŽ¯ ANSWERS TO YOUR QUESTIONS:

**2. How long does CALBEAF-53 TEST deployment take?**

**3. Do you need me to test locally first (localhost:7071)?**
Not necessary - I already tested locally and everything works. But happy to run local server if you want to test integration before TEST deployment.

**4. Any backend breaking changes?**
None! This is all additive:
- IP fields added (doesn't break existing data)
- New endpoint added (existing endpoints unchanged)
- Backward compatible
